branchItem.name: AW
branchItem.description: Clean series 10-AW filter regulators have fluorine grease, are assembled and inspected in a workshop, and have clean packaging (products are sealed in anti-static double bags after the surface has been blown with clean air).  The 10-AW series has a particle generation grade of 1, and is available with port sizes from 1/8 to 3/4 (Rc, G or NPT threads).

branchItem.name: AR
branchItem.description: Clean series 10-AR regulators have fluorine grease, are assembled and inspected in a workshop, and have clean packaging (products are sealed in anti-static double bags after the surface has been blown with clean air).  The 10-AR series has a particle generation grade of 1, and is available with port sizes from 1/8 to 1 (Rc, G or NPT threads).

branchItem.name: ARP
branchItem.description: <P>The ARP is a modular style, direct operated precision regulator.  A locking adjustment knob allows the pressure to be set, and then locked to prevent accidental setting changes. The ARP20/30/40 series is available with a backflow function that exhausts the air pressure in the outlet side reliably and quickly.  Special applications include (10-) clean room compliant, (20-)copper-free, fluorine-free, and (21-) clean room compliant, copper-free, fluorine-free and silicon-free.</P>

branchItem.name: SRF
SRH
SRP
AF
branchItem.description: Clean series 10-AF air filters have fluorine grease, are assembled and inspected in a workshop, and have clean packaging (products are sealed in anti-static double bags after the surface has been blown with clean air).  The 10-AF series has a particle generation grade of 1, and is available with port sizes from 1/8 to 1 (Rc, G or NPT threads).

branchItem.name: SF
branchItem.description: <P>SF series clean air filters are available as cartridge type or disposable type models.  The filtration level is 0.01 micron (filtering efficiency of 99.99%) on units with membrane elements.  The SFB20, with a sintered metallic element, has a nominal filtration of 120 micron.  The SF series can be used under different environments with chemical resistant and heat resistant materials (refer to catalog specifications for each series).</P>

branchItem.name: LLB
branchItem.description: Clean Air Module series LLB, available in a standard or high flow type, was designed to easily obtain clean air.  The space-saving module design reduces piping man-hours.  The series is assembled and double-packed in a clean room environment.  Available in 24 variations the LLB offers a nominal filtration rating of 0.01 &micro;m.  Parts in contact with fluid are grease-free and silicon-free.  Options include digital flow switch, regulator, ON/OFF valve, and restrictor.
